text:
What is up? Today, we are learning with
the actress who plays Daenerys Targaryen
on the popular series Game of Thrones.
Get ready for Emilia Clarke on Ellen!

So, this interview is really funny
because we see that Emilia is really

quite different from the character that
she plays on the popular TV series.

And, if you are new here, then we help
learners every week

to understand fast-speaking natives
without getting lost,

without missing the jokes,
and without subtitles!

So, if that sounds like something
you would like to be able to do too,

then, be sure to hit that Subscribe button
and the bell down below.
Now, get ready for this interview with Emilia Clarke!
Are you enjoying learning English with Ellen?

Then, be sure to hit that Like button
down below to let YouTube and us know
that you would like more lessons like this one.

So, learning English with your favorite TV series
can be a lot of fun, right?
But, sometimes it can be kind of difficult to understand if you don't have a native's help.

That's why we created our FREE 3-Part mini-course
teaching you English with Friends,

so that you can learn to understand all of
your favorite TV series

without getting lost
and without the subtitles, alright?

So, click up here or down
in the description below to learn more.

Are you learning British English or maybe
you would just like to understand the accent better?

Well, we just created a playlist that will
help you to learn British English.

You can check out all of our British English
lessons by clicking up here

or the description down below - and I would
highly recommend you to do that after
you finish this lesson.
So, when Rigby got his samples back from the laboratory,
he made a startling discovery.

What he believed to be igneous
was in fact sedimentary.
I got up there, and they were all... like, staring at me.

I opened up my mouth
and this British accent just came out.
Yeah, and not a very good one.
So, she's like, this whole, like, situation...
That was amazing.
Wow, that's actually very good.
Thank you.
Yeah... we had, like, a really good time!

I got so close to, like, getting Jai (Courtney) to buy me,
like, a $700 ar conditioning unit.

I, like, got the guy to help me - he was freaking out.
It was awesome.

All right, I hope you had a lot of fun with that
lesson, you laughed a lot and that you
understood a lot better that second time around.
Now, be sure to hit that Subscribe button
so that you can get on your newest lessons
every single week.
Also, check out that FREE 3-part mini-course
I told you about.
Check out this playlist teaching you English
with celebrities, and this other lesson
I think you will really enjoy.
Now, it's time to go beyond the classroom,
and LIVE your English!
Aww yeah!
